summary: **Hubris** is extreme pride or overconfidence, often leading to arrogance. It comes from Ancient Greek and can mean doing something without the right to do so. Hubris is like thinking you're better than others and not realizing your mistakes. It's usually about individuals, but their actions can affect the groups they belong to. This behavior is often linked to wanting to win at all costs, instead of finding peaceful solutions.
title: Hubris
